name: DMS FiveM Server
author: AntimatterZoneLLC
description: FiveM Game Server using Darkmatter Servers stack (Ubuntu 25.04 base).

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y curl git unzip xz-utils file jq
bash /tmp/install.sh

variables.name: FiveM License Key
variables.description: Your FiveM server license key from keymaster.fivem.net

variables.name: Steam Web API Key
variables.description: Your Steam API Key from https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey

variables.name: Artifact Version
variables.description: FiveM artifact version to install (recommended, latest, or specific build number)

variables.name: Custom Download URL
variables.description: Override download URL for FiveM artifacts if needed (optional)
